name: hacker-news-500
title: Hacker News 500
description: A menubar extension to view stories on Hacker News that hit 500 points.
author: KevinBatdorf

commands.name: view-500
commands.title: Hacker News 500
commands.subtitle: 500+ Points Stories
commands.description: View Hacker News stories with 500+ points submitted over the last 24 hours.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
